meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mandy Strine Tony Fan Roger Craig Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5977.

div.div:
Roger Craig game 2.
Roger sets a new single-day cash winnings record of $77,000.

td.p: Mandy Strine, a DMV administrator for a used car retailer from Hendersonville, Tennessee
Tony Fan, a law student from Marietta, Georgia
Roger Craig, a graduate student of computer science from Newark, Delaware (whose 1-day cash winnings total $37,000)

tr.td: (Alex: First, we honor those who illustrate children's books with...)
CALDECOTT MEDAL & HONOR BOOKS
ROCK 'N OLD
EQUALS ONE
SORT THROUGH THE WORD PROBLEM
THE "A" LIST

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Paul O. Zelinsky won the 1998 Medal for illustrating the tale of this girl who really knew how to let her hair down')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Paul O. Zelinsky won the 1998 Medal for illustrating the tale of this girl who really knew how to let her hair down

Mandy

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Roger
Tony
Mandy
THEY'RE IN HOW I MET YOUR MOTHER
LIVING IN NYC
SUIT UP!
IT'S GONNA "BE"...
WAIT FOR IT...
LEGENDARY!

')

tr.td: Roger
Tony
Mandy
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And after the film, the river was renamed to match the title of the movie.)
...
(Alex: [To Tony] And you are cor... We\'re going to accept that, yeah. It\'s [*].)
...
(Alex: It\'s up to Roger Craig; could set a new one-day record here if he came up with [*]... He did. I hope he wagered a lot... He did. New record! $77,000!)
[Applause]
TonyWhat is the Bridge over the River Kwai?
$4,600
RogerWhat is Bridge on the River Kwai?
$30,000
\"The Bridge on the River Kwai\"')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The inspiration for this title object in a novel & a 1957 movie actually spanned the Mae Khlung River')

tr.td: LITERARY & MOVIE TITLE OBJECTS
The inspiration for this title object in a novel & a 1957 movie actually spanned the Mae Khlung River
Roger
Tony
Mandy
2-day champion: $114,000
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Roger
Tony
Mandy

39 R
(including 3 DDs),
4 W

3 R,
4 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
